reviews.review_msg: Anthony was passionate about Business Strategy and really eager to learn about each of his students and their experience. He gave very relevant and informative feedback for each assignment and the video conferences that he established were helpful to engage the class. He encouraged sharing and really pushed to be creative.
I really enjoyed this course. Anthony is an effective teacher and his lectures are very engaging and relevant.

Anthony is definitely a down to earth kind of professor who understands the subject matter and how it will apply in real life situations. He does a very good job of encouraging students to use their imaginations and think outside of the box in a traditionally formulaic course as business strategy.

I absolutely loved Anthony's Business Strategy course. It was my favourite course taken from SFU. Anthony was really invested in our class, had really interesting articles for us to read, and facilitated our online meetings wonderfully. I learned a lot and look forward to applying what I've learned to my organization and wo
